data.name: Explory Story
data.detailed_description:
Our highly detailed worlds involve beautiful hand-drawn pixel scenery and thoughtful stories. The text on the floor can be interacted with, leading to a huge variety of effects and experiences. Reading and engaging with the text are crucial for progressing through the puzzles. Additionally, there are many secret interactions and hidden locations spread out throughout the game.


The entire game can be played entirely solo, however, we recommend grabbing a friend and battling your way through Explory Story. We have devised all of the levels, puzzles, and boss battles to accommodate one or two players.


Progressing through each level will involve interacting with objects and text in clever ways. In some cases, you will be tasked with restoring context to a sentence, in other cases, you will be crafting entirely new and highly variable phrases.


Explory Story contains a boss at the end of each Act. That means 4+ entirely unique boss fights, with unique mechanics and challenges. These can be undertaken alone or together with a friend. Additionally, each boss has varients that you can access by engaging with the story.

data.short_description: Alone, or with a friend, run around on the surface of many different stories. You can interact with the text, and the text can interact with you! There are boss battles, collectibles, a song, puzzles, and much more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better
  • Storage: 230 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
